item.description:
WINTER CACHE HARVEST DINNER AND SKILL SHARE

SATURDAY OCTOBER 20, 2007
NORTH DEERING GRANGE HALL, 1408 Washington Ave. Portland
10am-6pm...Skill Share
6-7pm...Harvest dinner
7-9pm...Music by Northern Spy and Vanessa Torress and Touching Ground

WORKSHOPS: $5-15 suggested donation

10am-4pm:
-cooking with local foods
4-5pm:
-Preserve the harvest with lacto-fermentation; Sauerkraut and Kimchi
-Herbs for Winter Health; Tinctures
-Community Root Cellar discussion
5-6pm:
-Herbs for Winter Health; Teas and Honey
-Beer/Wine/Mead Making
-Root Cellar Storage box making

DINNER AND MUSIC, 7-9pm: $10-20 suggested donation

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: WINTER CACHE HARVEST DINNER AND SKILL SHARE
